name: Moonrise at Cannon
description: This limited edition release is printed in bright, vivid colors on a thick piece of woven canvas. Each print contains a serial number guaranteeing its originality. Curated by Ecstase in a collaboration with Jen Lee for a limited edition of 75. This stunning piece is balanced not only in the reflections, but also in the color story and detail.
